doc:
C. Thomas Howell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C._Thomas_Howell 0 Christopher Thomas Howell (born December 7, 1966), known as C. Thomas Howell, is an American actor and director. He has starred in the films Soul Man, The Hitcher, Grandview U.S.A., Red Dawn, Secret Admirer and The Outsiders. He has also appeared in Gettysburg as Thomas Chamberlain, E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial, The Amazing Spider-Man, Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox and Suicide Squad: Hell to Pay. Christopher_Thomas_Howell ( born December_7_,_1966 ) , known as C._Thomas_Howell , is an_American_actor_and_director . He has_starred in the_films_Soul_Man , The_Hitcher , Grandview_U.S.A. , Red_Dawn , Secret_Admirer and The_Outsiders . He has_also_appeared in Gettysburg as Thomas_Chamberlain , E.T. the_Extra-Terrestrial , The_Amazing_Spider-Man , Justice_League : The_Flashpoint_Paradox and Suicide_Squad : Hell to_Pay .
